ObjectClass.Name: Dome
ObjectClass.Description:
DOME: Durable cloaked weapon emplacement Devastating versus aircraft Fires in four-shot bursts
Detects cloaked units Upgradeable attack rate (Weapons Tech) Supremacy: upgradeable to Beam Cannon

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target \Fire rate upgradable (Weapons tech)\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 50 (+150), R 24\Air: 50 (+150), R 24

ObjectClass.Name: Dome (Wreckage)

This Dome is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
